ISSUE.TITLE: Debounce `wait` utility to 300ms
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If 300ms elapse, we actually render the [ora](https://github.com/sindresorhus/ora). This will make it not render unnecessarily for fast commands. ### Example ``` ▲ now ls ⠏ Fetching deployments ``` The "⠏ Fetching deployments" line would only be rendered if `now ls` is taking longer than 300ms.
